title: List of all Androidfantastic  app  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidfantastic  app  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FantasticPix
repoList.description: A paginated photos app that loads searched photos from Pexels.com. Uses Android Jetpack - MVVM, Room and Paging library.

repoList.name: Sugoi-To-Do-List
repoList.description: Android: This is a to do list app that lets you jot tasks down so you don't forget to do them. Also allows you to attach images by taking a picture or picking from the gallery. Uses some cool libraries to provide fantastic UX and UI.

repoList.name: Try-Kotlin-Series
repoList.description: Kotlin is a fantastic language that improves greatly upon Java and at the same time can use all Java libraries and frameworks. It provides both the power of OOP and functional programming. It is quickly becoming the language of choice for developing Android apps.
